_header: O goodly fair sith I have done and shall
Title(s): ‘O good swet hert have me not in disdayne’
Subjects: envoys; lovers, addresses to beloved; complaints, lovers’
_description: Charles d’Orléans, ‘O good swet hert have me not in disdayne’ — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy (abab)

BLHar682.First Lines:
O Goodly fayre sith y haue doon & shallBandonyd my silf myn
                    hert & my seruice…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…How loue for loue is skilful gardonyngO good swet hert haue
                    me not in disdayne
